title: How a summer job grew into an ice cream empire, with CEO Ben Van Leeuwen
description: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream is one of the fastest growing dessert brands in the country. It’s known for its seriously delicious classic flavors and its wacky collaborations. (Kraft Mac and Cheese ice cream, anyone?)
